spec_data.Name: libproxy
spec_data.Description:
libproxy offers the following features:

    * extremely small core footprint (< 35K)
    * no external dependencies within libproxy core
      (libproxy plugins may have dependencies)
    * only 3 functions in the stable external API
    * dynamic adjustment to changing network topology
    * a standard way of dealing with proxy settings across all scenarios
    * a sublime sense of joy and accomplishment
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 04 Aug 2017 12:49:47 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: A library handling all the details of proxy configuration
